00015 **   Specification for the CFS Health and Safety (HS) command and telemetry
00016 **   message data types.
00017 **
00018 ** Notes:
00019 **   Constants and enumerated types related to these message structures
00020 **   are defined in hs_msgdefs.h. They are kept separate to allow easy
00021 **   integration with ASIST RDL files which can't handle typedef
00022 **   declarations (see the main comment block in hs_msgdefs.h for more
00023 **   info).
